Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I just bought KSP a week ago and have been enjoying it immensely. I learned about the game watching a couple of LP's and thought it looked like fun. I've also been reading the tutorials on the wiki, which have really helped. Currently I'm trying to get two ships to dock successfully, but I still have quite a ways to go. So far I've just barely managed to get the ships close together and in the same orbit a couple of times. Hopefully I will master it soon so I can start building a cool space station and other cool space things! Anyway, if anyone has any good tips please let me know.

See You Space Cowboys,

DancinDarunia
